salaryExpectations: LKR 90,000 (Associate BA) to LKR 600,000+ (Lead BA/Product Owner) per month.
futureOutlook: The Business Analyst acts as the critical bridge between business needs and the technology team. As software projects become more complex, the need for skilled BAs who can accurately define requirements is crucial. It is a core role in the IT industry and often serves as a pathway to Project Management or Product Management.
